TextData.SourceString:
Simple, old fashioned gun. 
Fires a single, powerful shot at the expense of a long reload time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Simple, old fashioned gun. 
Fires a single, powerful shot at the expense of a long reload time.

TextData.SourceString:
<itemName id=|Pan|/> with jam spread on it.
The sweetness of the berries complements it perfectly.
TextData.LocalizedString:
<itemName id=|Pan|/> with jam spread on it.
The sweetness of the berries complements it perfectly.

TextData.SourceString:
A <itemName id=|Salad|/> made by mixing <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> and <itemName id=|Tomato|/>.
Eating it slightly improves work speed for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A <itemName id=|Salad|/> made by mixing <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> and <itemName id=|Tomato|/>.
Eating it slightly improves work speed for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by frying an <itemName id=|Egg|/> and topping it with ketchup.
Eating it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by frying an <itemName id=|Egg|/> and topping it with ketchup.
Eating it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString: A dish prepared by stir frying <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> and <itemName id=|Meat|/>. When eaten, it will temporarily increase <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10%.
TextData.LocalizedString: A dish prepared by stir frying <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> and <itemName id=|Meat|/>. When eaten, it will temporarily increase <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10%.

TextData.SourceString: A culinary dinner sandwiching a sausage in an <itemName id=|Pan|/>. Consumption leads to an improved sense of fullness for a specific period.
TextData.LocalizedString: A culinary dinner sandwiching a sausage in an <itemName id=|Pan|/>. Consumption leads to an improved sense of fullness for a specific period.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by mixing <itemName id=|Flour|/> and <itemName id=|Milk|/> together then baking.
Eating it progressively decreases the rate at which one's sanity decreases for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by mixing <itemName id=|Flour|/> and <itemName id=|Milk|/> together then baking.
Eating it progressively decreases the rate at which one's sanity decreases for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by marinating <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>s in a marinade.
Eating it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by marinating <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>s in a marinade.
Eating it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
Cream soup made of <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>s.
Eating it allows you to stay fuller for slightly longer for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Cream soup made of <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>s.
Eating it allows you to stay fuller for slightly longer for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish mixing pasta with <itemName id=|Egg|/> and <itemName id=|Milk|/>.
Eating it makes it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +20% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish mixing pasta with <itemName id=|Egg|/> and <itemName id=|Milk|/>.
Eating it makes it improves <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +20% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString: A dish where bacon, <itemName id=|Lettuce|/>, <itemName id=|Tomato|/> are sandwiched in <itemName id=|Pan|/>. Consumption increases <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +15% for a while.
TextData.LocalizedString: A dish where bacon, <itemName id=|Lettuce|/>, <itemName id=|Tomato|/> are sandwiched in <itemName id=|Pan|/>. Consumption increases <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +15% for a while.

TextData.SourceString: A dish where a hamburger, <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> the <itemName id=|Tomato|/> are contained in the <itemName id=|Pan|/>. When eaten, it boosts one's stomach fullness and <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10% for a while.
TextData.LocalizedString: A dish where a hamburger, <itemName id=|Lettuce|/> the <itemName id=|Tomato|/> are contained in the <itemName id=|Pan|/>. When eaten, it boosts one's stomach fullness and <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10% for a while.

TextData.SourceString: A meal made with a <itemName id=|Hamburger|/> with cheese squeezed between it. Upon consumption, it increases the satiety level for a certain period as well as <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> +10%.
TextData.LocalizedString: A meal made with a <itemName id=|Hamburger|/> with cheese squeezed between it. Upon consumption, it increases the satiety level for a certain period as well as <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> +10%.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by piling <itemName id=|Berries|/>, <itemName id=|Tomato|/> and cheese on <itemName id=|Pan|/>.
Eating it slightly improves work speed and allows you to stay fuller for slightly longer for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by piling <itemName id=|Berries|/>, <itemName id=|Tomato|/> and cheese on <itemName id=|Pan|/>.
Eating it slightly improves work speed and allows you to stay fuller for slightly longer for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString: A pasta dish combined with meat sauce. Eating it makes it difficult for sanity to decrease and provides <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> +10% for a while.
TextData.LocalizedString: A pasta dish combined with meat sauce. Eating it makes it difficult for sanity to decrease and provides <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> +10% for a while.

TextData.SourceString: A stew made with <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>. Consumption elevates work speed and offers <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> +10% for a particular duration.
TextData.LocalizedString: A stew made with <itemName id=|Mushroom|/>. Consumption elevates work speed and offers <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> +10% for a particular duration.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish that is eaten during celebrations.
Put it in the chest at your breeding farm to have a Pal lay a particularly healthy egg.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish that is eaten during celebrations.
Put it in the chest at your breeding farm to have a Pal lay a particularly healthy egg.

A mysterious coin. Apparently there are people who collect these.
A <characterName id=|MimicDog|/> will usually have them, but
for some reason, they cannot be obtained by butchering it.

but drastically decreases SAN value.

Its close-range damage output is top-notch.

TextData.SourceString:
Fires high-output energy projectiles. 
Causes an energy explosion upon impact.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Fires high-output energy projectiles. 
Causes an energy explosion upon impact.

A <itemName id=|FragGrenade_Dark|/> useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Dark|/> damage to enemies.

TextData.SourceString:
A hardy and filling crop that grows in any terrain. 
Not suitable for raw consumption.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A hardy and filling crop that grows in any terrain. 
Not suitable for raw consumption.

TextData.SourceString:
A vibrant, nutrient-rich root vegetable. 
Not suitable for raw consumption.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A vibrant, nutrient-rich root vegetable. 
Not suitable for raw consumption.

TextData.SourceString:
A cherished and easy-to-grow vegetable with a rich history. 
Not suitable for eating raw.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A cherished and easy-to-grow vegetable with a rich history. 
Not suitable for eating raw.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by wrapping a filling of mushrooms and meat in wheat flour and boiling it. The chewy texture is irresistible. 
Eating it improves your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by wrapping a filling of mushrooms and meat in wheat flour and boiling it. The chewy texture is irresistible. 
Eating it improves your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by stir-frying <itemName id=|Carrot|/> and <itemName id=|Onion|/>. 
A simple and delicious way to enjoy vegetables. Eating it will slightly increase your work speed and improve your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by stir-frying <itemName id=|Carrot|/> and <itemName id=|Onion|/>. 
A simple and delicious way to enjoy vegetables. Eating it will slightly increase your work speed and improve your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by deep-frying <itemName id=|Potato|/>. 
Once you start eating, you can't stop. Eating it will make it harder for your SAN value to decrease for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by deep-frying <itemName id=|Potato|/>. 
Once you start eating, you can't stop. Eating it will make it harder for your SAN value to decrease for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by stir-frying noodles with vegetables and meat. 
The rich seasoning pairs perfectly with the thick cuts of meat. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_Attack|/> by 20% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by stir-frying noodles with vegetables and meat. 
The rich seasoning pairs perfectly with the thick cuts of meat. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_Attack|/> by 20% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by wrapping vegetables and mushrooms in a thin skin and deep-frying them. 
The crispy texture is delightful. Eating it will make it harder for your SAN value to decrease and increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by wrapping vegetables and mushrooms in a thin skin and deep-frying them. 
The crispy texture is delightful. Eating it will make it harder for your SAN value to decrease and increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by coating potatoes with sauce and baking them to perfection. 
Best enjoyed hot and fresh. Eating it will provide lasting fullness and increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by coating potatoes with sauce and baking them to perfection. 
Best enjoyed hot and fresh. Eating it will provide lasting fullness and increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A soup simmered with a variety of vegetables. 
Drinking it warms you to the core. Eating it will increase your work speed for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A soup simmered with a variety of vegetables. 
Drinking it warms you to the core. Eating it will increase your work speed for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by simmering vegetables and meat with spices. 
The rich flavor is highlighted by large chunks of tender meat. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 25% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by simmering vegetables and meat with spices. 
The rich flavor is highlighted by large chunks of tender meat. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by 25% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
A dish made by simmering meat and potatoes in a sweet and savory sauce. 
It has a mysteriously nostalgic taste. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 25% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A dish made by simmering meat and potatoes in a sweet and savory sauce. 
It has a mysteriously nostalgic taste. Eating it will increase your <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by 25% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:

TextData.SourceString:
[Tides of Terraria]
According to the legend, this sword was brought back from a distant land by <characterName id=|KendoFrog|/>.
Why? We have no idea...
Fires a bouncing cat projectile with each swing to attack enemies.
TextData.LocalizedString:
[Tides of Terraria]
According to the legend, this sword was brought back from a distant land by <characterName id=|KendoFrog|/>.
Why? We have no idea...
Fires a bouncing cat projectile with each swing to attack enemies.

TextData.SourceString:
Pulverized remnants of some kind of biological tissue.
Leftover residue from butchering a genetically reconstructed Pal,
it serves no purpose and can only be sold or discarded.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Pulverized remnants of some kind of biological tissue.
Leftover residue from butchering a genetically reconstructed Pal,
it serves no purpose and can only be sold or discarded.

TextData.SourceString:
A beam rifle crafted with advanced technology.
Charges energy to deliver one powerful shot.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A beam rifle crafted with advanced technology.
Charges energy to deliver one powerful shot.

TextData.SourceString:
An assault rifle capable of firing endlessly without reloading.
Prolonged bursts cause overheating, leaving you exposed.
Use with caution.
TextData.LocalizedString:
An assault rifle capable of firing endlessly without reloading.
Prolonged bursts cause overheating, leaving you exposed.
Use with caution.

TextData.SourceString:
A shotgun that fires energy rounds.
Excelling in rapid fire, its close-range firepower is truly otherworldly.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A shotgun that fires energy rounds.
Excelling in rapid fire, its close-range firepower is truly otherworldly.

TextData.SourceString:
Firing this at a Pal in your team temporarily boosts that Pal's attack and defense. 
Firing it at an enemy deals damage instead.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Firing this at a Pal in your team temporarily boosts that Pal's attack and defense. 
Firing it at an enemy deals damage instead.

TextData.SourceString:
Firing it at an allied Pal boosts their attack and defense, while hitting an enemy deals damage. 
Thanks to improvements, the boost is stronger and lasts longer, and it deals more damage to enemies.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Firing it at an allied Pal boosts their attack and defense, while hitting an enemy deals damage. 
Thanks to improvements, the boost is stronger and lasts longer, and it deals more damage to enemies.

When stored in Key Items, it allows you to

a <mapObjectName id=|OperatingTable|/>.

TextData.SourceString:
[Tides of Terraria] 
This curious sword releases vibrant green shockwaves with each strike, allowing you to hit enemies from afar despite being a melee weapon.
TextData.LocalizedString:
[Tides of Terraria] 
This curious sword releases vibrant green shockwaves with each strike, allowing you to hit enemies from afar despite being a melee weapon.

TextData.SourceString:
[Tides of Terraria] 
A mystical sword with a rainbow-colored blade. 
Wielding it lets you summon up to nine blessed swords to fight alongside you.
TextData.LocalizedString:
[Tides of Terraria] 
A mystical sword with a rainbow-colored blade. 
Wielding it lets you summon up to nine blessed swords to fight alongside you.

TextData.SourceString:
[Tides of Terraria]
A powerful gun fueled by unknown energy.
Fires homing missiles at regular intervals that track enemies and explode on impact.
Has a 66% chance to not consume ammo when firing.
TextData.LocalizedString:
[Tides of Terraria]
A powerful gun fueled by unknown energy.
Fires homing missiles at regular intervals that track enemies and explode on impact.
Has a 66% chance to not consume ammo when firing.

A lantern that radiates a rainbow-hued light. 
Holding it aloft releases homing light projectiles that strike enemies multiple times.

[Tides of Terraria]

TextData.LocalizedString:
An unusual treat crafted from <itemName id=|Meat_JellyfishFairy|/> and <itemName id=|PalFluid|/>. 
Eating it will slightly increase EXP gain and increase <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK|/> by +10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
An unusual treat crafted from <itemName id=|Meat_JellyfishGhost|/> and <itemName id=|Berries|/>. 
Eating it will slightly increase EXP gain and increase <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +10% for a period of time.
TextData.LocalizedString:
An unusual treat crafted from <itemName id=|Meat_JellyfishGhost|/> and <itemName id=|Berries|/>. 
Eating it will slightly increase EXP gain and increase <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE|/> by +10% for a period of time.

TextData.SourceString:
Charcoal-grilled to perfection, this steak offers a crispy exterior and melt-in-your-mouth juiciness. 
Unique compounds seal in flavor and enhance shelf life.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Charcoal-grilled to perfection, this steak offers a crispy exterior and melt-in-your-mouth juiciness. 
Unique compounds seal in flavor and enhance shelf life.

TextData.SourceString:
A lantern that can be attached to the hip.
It lights up automatically at night.
You can also switch its lighting mode to keep it on at all times.
Just one is enough to find your way in the dark.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A lantern that can be attached to the hip.
It lights up automatically at night.
You can also switch its lighting mode to keep it on at all times.
Just one is enough to find your way in the dark.

TextData.SourceString:
A rare ore formed over countless years 
in the deep sea. 
Can be retrieved from the depths with 
a magnet and fishing rod.
TextData.LocalizedString:
A rare ore formed over countless years 
in the deep sea. 
Can be retrieved from the depths with 
a magnet and fishing rod.

TextData.SourceString:
An alloy of <itemName id=|ManganeseOre|/>, <itemName id=|CopperIngot|/>, and <itemName id=|Coal|/>. 
Highly resistant to energy, making it ideal for crafting weapons.
TextData.LocalizedString:
An alloy of <itemName id=|ManganeseOre|/>, <itemName id=|CopperIngot|/>, and <itemName id=|Coal|/>. 
Highly resistant to energy, making it ideal for crafting weapons.

TextData.SourceString: Proof of defeating [Whalaska, Nice Ice Lance]. Simply possessing it permanently increases the stats of the Pals in your team.

A small fruit filled with kindness.
It is said that a Pal who eats it will open 
its heart to humans.
Choose carefully which Pal you give it to.

Grants the ability to generate a barrier that blocks incoming attacks.

Saddle for safely riding <characterName id=|LegendDeer|/>.
Grants the ability to generate a barrier that blocks incoming attacks.

TextData.SourceString:
[ULTRAKILL Collab]
An electrically powered revolver capable of firing endlessly.
When equipped, Pal Sphere throws are replaced with Coin Toss.
Hitting a coin with the <itemName id=|OctaviaRevolver|/> causes the bullet to ricochet toward enemies.
TextData.LocalizedString:
[ULTRAKILL Collab]
An electrically powered revolver capable of firing endlessly.
When equipped, Pal Sphere throws are replaced with Coin Toss.
Hitting a coin with the <itemName id=|OctaviaRevolver|/> causes the bullet to ricochet toward enemies.

TextData.SourceString:
[ULTRAKILL Collab] 
A shotgun powered by heat, capable of firing endlessly. 
When equipped, throwing a Pal Sphere is replaced with Core Eject. 
Hold to charge and extend its range. Cores hit by shots from <itemName id=|OctaviaRevolver|/> will explode.
